about_the_game:
Even if you don't have a band, you can realize your musical vision using virtual instruments. Music Creator and SONAR include new Cakewalk Sound Center, which gives you access to at least 150 different instrument sounds. It includes acoustic & electric guitars, basses, drums, pianos, synths, strings, ethnic sounds, and more.

Cakewalk Sound Center is bundled with the following Cakewalk products on STEAM.

  • Music Creator 6 Touch
  • Music Creator 7
  • SONAR Steam Edition/Artist/Professional/Platinum
  • SONAR X3 Base/Studio/Professional

Even if you don't have a band, you can realize your musical vision using virtual instruments. Music Creator and SONAR include new Cakewalk Sound Center, which gives you access to at least 150 different instrument sounds. It includes acoustic & electric guitars, basses, drums, pianos, synths, strings, ethnic sounds, and more.

Cakewalk Sound Center is bundled with the following Cakewalk products on STEAM.

  • Music Creator 6 Touch
  • Music Creator 7
  • SONAR Steam Edition/Artist/Professional/Platinum
  • SONAR X3 Base/Studio/Professional
name: Cakewalk Sound Center

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, or 10 (32- or 64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.6GHz Intel or AMD multi-core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x800 (1920 x 1080+ recommended)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ASIO compatible hardware is recommended

short_description: Cakewalk Sound Center gives you access to at least 150 different instrument sounds. Including acoustic & electric guitars, basses, drums, pianos, synths, strings, ethnic sounds, and more.
